summary: A custom version of categorized favorites menu made compatible with other mods. Feel free to request a mod to be added!
descriptionHtml:
This is a custom version of Categorized Favorites Menu made for compatibility with other mods. My aim is to add as many mods as possible, if you want a mod made compatible, go ahead and request it in the comments section.

The motivation behind this mod was initially because I wanted my mods to be sorted correctly, however after seeing a lack of recently updated custom versions of CFM, I decided to take the project unto myself. This is a completely new version, built off the original mod. I did not copy any other custom versions that may exist. Even though it may be small now, I plan to expand this version as I discover new mods and others are requested.

Also, please upload screenshots of your favorites menu using this mod. It's better to see lots of examples than just my own menu. Thanks!

[color=#ffff00]Please be aware that with many mods being added, there are many possible conflicts that I may have missed. If you find something that isn't sorted in the right category, please report it in the bugs tab with the name of the items/spells and the mods they are from. I will do my best to fix any issues.

[color=#00ff00]Always give feedback and suggestions - it keeps me motivated![/color][/color]

[size=5]Requirements:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4862/?]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url]

[size=5]Compatibility:[/size]
[b][color=#ff0000]Legacy of the Dragonborn[/color][/b] requires a compatibility patch. This will change the name of Wanderlust to Wanderlust Ring. This was incompatible with Thunderchild that contains a shout called Wanderlust. Without this patch the ring will be sorted under shouts/powers.

[color=#ff0000][b]Colorful Magic[/b][/color] requires a compatibility patch. This will change the name of three spells added by this mod with an appended word "Spell" on the end. This includes Become Ethereal which conflicted with the vanilla shout, Freeze Time which conflicted with an added shout, and Soul Breaker which conflicted with an added weapon. Without this patch, Become Ethereal and Freeze time will appear in shouts and Soul Breaker will appear in weapons.

[color=#ff0000][b]Master of Time[/b][/color] requires a compatibility patch. This will change the name of the Slow Time spell which conflicted with Colorful Magic and the vanilla shout. Without this patch, Slow Time will appear in shouts/powers.

All patches are optional selections in the installer.

[size=5]Controls:[/size]
1 to 9 with item selected: Hotkey selected item.
Ctrl + w/s/left/right: Moves the menu up/down/left/right 5 pixels.
Hold ctrl+shift to move by 1 pixel.
Ctrl + f: Create an equipset from the currently equipped items.
Ctrl + delete: Delete the selected equipset.
Mouse wheel: scroll list
Alt + mouse wheel: scroll list faster
Ctrl + mouse wheel: switch lists

[size=5]Installation:[/size]
Install with Nexus Mod Manager and you will get an installer window. When asked to overwrite, do so or this mod will not work.

[size=5]Uninstallation:[/size]
Simply click uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager. If you did a manual install, you will have to reinstall Categorized Favorites Menu after deleting favoritesmenu.cfg from your Data/Interface folder. Also delete Foxy's CFM.esp and any patches from Data.

[size=5]See also:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76812/?]Foxy's Item Sorting Extensions[/url]
